sentences.en: A crude oil slick quickly spreads out over water.
sentences.cn: 原油泄露后的浮油很快在水面上扩散开来。

sentences.en: A falling stone hit him slick on the head.
sentences.cn: 一块落石正好击中他的头部.

sentences.en: a slick advertising campaign
sentences.cn: 华而不实的广告攻势

sentences.en: a slick Hollywood production
sentences.cn: 一部场面恢宏但内容肤浅的好莱坞电影

sentences.en: a slick used-car salesman
sentences.cn: 油嘴滑舌的二手车推销员

sentences.en: An oil slick caused by a spill from a supertanker has hit several beaches.
sentences.cn: 一艘超级油轮的石油泄漏形成的浮油膜已经影响了好几个海滩。

sentences.en: Colonel Cathcart was a slick, successful , slipshod, unhappy man of thirty - six .
sentences.cn: 卡思卡特上校为人机灵圆滑, 事业一帆风顺, 年纪已 三十六 岁,他不修边幅, 性格抑郁愁闷.

sentences.en: Don't be fooled by slick politicians.
sentences.cn: 别被那些巧舌如簧的政客蒙骗了。

sentences.en: Experts are trying to devise ways to clean up the huge slick.
sentences.cn: 专家们正想方设法清除这片面积巨大的浮油。

sentences.en: He got round the defender using some slick footwork.
sentences.cn: 他用灵巧的步法突破了后卫的防守。

sentences.en: His style is slick and visually exciting.
sentences.cn: 他的演技娴熟，赏心悦目。

sentences.en: It's precisely that sort of slick sales - talk that I mistrust.
sentences.cn: 我不相信的正是那种油腔滑调的推销宣传.

sentences.en: She's very slick, but I don't believe a word she says.
sentences.cn: 她很伶俐, 但她的话我一句也不信.

sentences.en: slick advertising
sentences.cn: 虚华的广告

sentences.en: The dancers gave a very slick performance.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈者的舞姿十分娴熟.

sentences.en: The oil slick is now 35 miles long.
sentences.cn: 这层浮油现长达35英里。

sentences.en: The presentation was very slick.
sentences.cn: 这个展示会非常华而不实。

sentences.en: There's a big difference between an amateur video and a slick Hollywood production.
sentences.cn: 业余人士拍摄的视频片段和制作精良的好莱坞影片之间存在着巨大的差距。

sentences.en: There's a world of difference between an amateur video and a slick Hollywood production.
sentences.cn: 业余制作的录像短片与好莱坞制作精湛的电影作品有天壤之别。

sentences.en: They were outplayed by the Colombians' slick passing and decisive finishing.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚队凭借流畅的传球和终场前的制胜进球击败了他们。

words.tran_cn: [机]平滑器；修光工具；通俗杂志

trans.tran_cn: 光滑的，熟练的，灵巧的，机灵的，聪明的，华而不实的
光滑之处，[机]平滑器，[机]修光工具，一层浮油
使光滑，使光亮，使美观，使齐整，占…的便宜
